alert.note: Alert for Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 11:58AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Essex County through 100 PM EDT... At 1158 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Indian Lake, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newcomb, Vanderwhacker Mountain, and Tahawus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
